body: If you do not wish to apply for an occupation order, please go to section 9 of this form.

components.html: State the address of the dwelling-house to which your application relates.

components.label: State whether it is occupied by you or the respondent now or in the past, or whether it was intended to be occupied by you or the respondent.
components.name: auto_name__58

components.legend: State whether you are entitled to occupy the dwelling-house.
components.name: auto_name__59

components.legend: State whether the respondent is entitled to occupy the dwelling-house.
components.name: auto_name__61

items.label: a spouse or civil partner who has home rights in the dwelling-house, or a person who is entitled to occupy it by virtue of a beneficial estate or interest or contract or by virtue of any enactment giving him or her the right to remain in occupation.
items.name: auto_name__63

components.legend: On the basis of your answers to (C) and (D) above, tick one of the boxes 1 to 6 below to show the category into which you fit.

components.label: If you tick box 1, state whether there is a dispute or pending proceedings between you and the respondent about your right to occupy the dwelling-house.
components.name: auto_name__64

items.label: a former spouse or former civil partner with no existing right to occupy, where the respondent spouse or civil partner is so entitled.
items.name: auto_name__65

items.label: a cohabitant or former cohabitant with no existing right to occupy, where the respondent cohabitant or former cohabitant is so entitled.
items.name: auto_name__66

items.label: a spouse or former spouse who is not entitled to occupy, where the respondent spouse or former spouse is also not entitled.
items.name: auto_name__67

items.label: a civil partner or former civil partner who is not entitled to occupy, where the respondent civil partner or former civil partner is also not entitled.
items.name: auto_name__68

items.label: a cohabitant or former cohabitant who is not entitled to occupy, where the respondent cohabitant or former cohabitant is also not entitled.
items.name: auto_name__69

heading: Application for an occupation order
